events.name: inputFocus
events.comment: Defines what will be affected by the clicks

children.text: Moose head - Spawns the book key
Fireplace - Changes animation for decoration purposes only
Painting - Changes animation to tell the player the code to disable the jammer
Bookcase - Gives the player a tip on what to do
Door - Reminds the player of the objective
Sky - Decoration purposes only
Book - Bring the book to the foreground so that it can be opened with the key
Keypad - Bring the keypad to the foreground so that the jammer can be disabled
Cabinet - Bring the cabinet to the foreground so that the player can find the batteries
Exit the cabinet close up view
Drawers - Change the cabinet animation to reflect which drawer is opened
Reveal the battery pack
Hide the battery pack
CabinetCloseUp - close the cabinet
Add pickup to inventory as an item

children.functionDescription: Add an item to the inventory

functionParameters.name: par_uid
functionParameters.comment: UID of the item to be added to the inventory

children.text: Items tips
items dropped
Drop the key on top of the book to open it
Drop the batteries on top of the remote to combine
Drop the remote (with batteries) on top of the bookcase to open it
If any of the conditions above is satisfied, just return the item to the inventory
Touching the fader brings the player back to the default view
Exit book close up view
If the player does not have the remote control, do not exit
Otherwise, exit and delete the book from the scene
Exit keypad close up view
Set inputFocus to world again
Show tip text
Operations on the start of layout
Put the tips inside a dictionary object
Move stars
Hide tutorial and start the game
Tell the game to move the screen to the right
Tell the game to move the screen to the left
Move the screen
Add item to inventory
Insert the numbers into the keypad and check for "Enter"
Player input the correct password - [b]Mission success![/b]
Player input the incorrect password - [b]Try again...[/b]
